name: NavigatorPopHandler
desc: Enables the handling of system back gestures.

fields.name: child
fields.desc: The widget to place below this in the widget tree.

fields.name: enabled
fields.desc: Whether this widget's ability to handle system back gestures is enabled or disabled.

fields.name: onPop
fields.desc: Called when a handleable pop event happens.

fields.name: onPopWithResult
fields.desc: Called when a handleable pop event happens.
